findCommand.testerPromotion:
Some stations haven't been tested yet. If you want to, you can participate to our program by becoming a song tester.
Use the `/guide` command to get more informations
findCommand.matchingDescription: I found {{availableLength}}** stations matching your research

guide.title: Lofi Girl bot's guide
guide.intro: This is the guide of Lofi Girl bot.
guide.playMusic:
**Play a music**
To play a music on Lofi Girl, use the command {{play}} followed by the song you want to listen. This option is optionnal. In case you don't provide a song, a random one is picked up.
guide.recommendation:
**Recommendation system**
Every day, my creator puts a song that he likes on the bot and you can listen to it by using the {{play}} command.
To get the recommendation, start typing `recommendation` in the text input.
An option called `‚ù§Ô∏è recommendation - get the recommendation of the day` will pop up. Click on it to play the recommendation
guide.songAddition:
**Song addition :**
When you've started to listen to a music, you can add other songs that will be played once the first one is finished. Use the command {{add}} to add a song.
guide.autoadd:
**Auto-addition song system :**
When you've started to listen to a music, you may want to listen lofi music forever, so use the command {{autoadd}} to toggle this mode.
guide.protip:
üí° *pro-tip*
When you are listening to a music, you can use the {{playing}} command to see what's played
guide.feedback:
**Feedback system :**
If you want to get a feedback about a song, you can see it by using the {{info}} command (using `station` subcommand), or the {{playing}} command, if a feedback has been sent, it will appear.
If you want to make your own, you can become a song tester by contacting my owner. You can do it by joining the [support server]({{support}}), or getting to the support by our [top.gg page]({{topgg}})
guide.suggestions:
If you have a suggestion of a Lofi music (from the [Lofi Channel]({{lofi}}), you can submit it to us.
Use the command {{suggestion}} to submit a song
